name: Chrono Control
description:
You are trapped  in a 10 second time loop. Can you use time shifting abilities and break out of it?

Submission to the 3rd Bullet Hell Game Jam. The theme was "10 seconds".

Press F, K or return to start the game.

Controls Keyboard:
- Movement: WASD or arrow keys
- Attack: F or K

Controls Gamepad:
- Movement: Analog Stick
- Attack: A or X

All code and assets have been developed during the week of the game jam, with the exception of audio and fonts.
